CustomField.formula:
IF(TEXT(Pricing_Cluster__c)<> null, IF(
OR( ISPICKVAL(Accreditation_Type__c,"Maintenance"), ISPICKVAL(Portfolio__c,"Airscale Wifi") ),
" ",
IF( Nokia_CPQ_Env_Type__c='sCRM', HYPERLINK('/apex/XauthorIntermediatePage?selectedRecordId='+Id+'&appName=Order Generation&mode=touchless&outputType=EXCEL','Export'), HYPERLINK( Nokia_Env_URL__c & '/apex/XauthorIntermediatePage?selectedRecordId='+Id+'&appName=Order Generation&mode=touchless&outputType=EXCEL','Export') )
),"Pricing Cluster Required")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Partner Price Catalogue for loading into OEPs. Exports are available in Notes & Attachments section of the Accreditation record.
CustomField.label: OEP Import File
